oai_dc:dc.dc:title: November 9th Press Release
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Memphis Police Department; Holloman, Frank; Lux, Henry E.; NAACP; protests;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Press release further outlining the Memphis Police Department's regulations and reasoning for the Black Monday protest on November 10, 1969. Handwritten drafts and edited drafts of this press release are also available in the manuscript collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Holloman, Frank
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript Collection processed by Wayne Dowdy
